name: Vinsmoke Yonji
text: Activate: Main DON!!-1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck), You may trash this character: if your leader has the <<GERMA 66>> Type, you may play up to 1 Cost 4 "Vinsmoke Yonji" from your hand or trash.
